sentences.sentence: Anything from cosmic rays to radiation to diet may activate a dormant oncogene.
sentences.translation: 从宇宙射线到辐射到日常饮食，任何东西都可能激活潜伏的致癌基因。

sentences.sentence: Aberrant somatic hypermutation and deregulation of the oncogene BCL-6 are associated with lymphomagenesis.
sentences.translation: 异常的超变和异常的致癌基因 BCL-6 与淋巴瘤的发生具有相关性。

sentences.sentence: Mutational activation of the BRAF oncogene is the most common genetic alteration in cutaneous melanoma.
sentences.translation: BRAF癌基因突变的激活是皮肤黑色素瘤最常见的基因改变。
